query:
-- Setze erste 7 Fragen auf correct
UPDATE question_progress 
SET firstAttemptStatus = 'correct', 
    status = 'answered',
    lastAttemptCorrect = 1,
    attemptCount = 1,
    lastAttemptAt = NOW()
WHERE userId = 7 
  AND courseId = 30002 
  AND questionId IN (
    SELECT id FROM questions 
    WHERE courseId = 30002 
    ORDER BY id 
    LIMIT 7
  );

-- Setze nächste 5 Fragen auf incorrect
UPDATE question_progress 
SET firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect', 
    status = 'answered',
    lastAttemptCorrect = 0,
    attemptCount = 1,
    lastAttemptAt = NOW()
WHERE userId = 7 
  AND courseId = 30002 
  AND questionId IN (
    SELECT id FROM questions 
    WHERE courseId = 30002 
    ORDER BY id 
    LIMIT 5 OFFSET 7
  );
